reviewText: This is one of the very best overall Pride events as far as I am concerned. The re-release of this event on a special 2 DVD set is simply fantastic. The production value is through the roof and the fights are for the most part phenomenal from start to finish. This is yet another slice of MMA history that you should invest in... you wont be sorry!

reviewText: I own the original Pride 10 dvd and this dvd set is even better due to the extra features.  An event that every MMA fan should own
Title: N/A

reviewText: This DVD showcases what all hardcore MMA fans worth their Affliction T-shirts love about PRIDE. The event is full of action throughout and featured every single type of fight, from stand-up slugfests to grappling matches and everything in between. While this event has been nominated more times than any other as the best PRIDE, if not MMA, event ever, personally I believe those honors go to PRIDE 14 and UFC 95, respectively. However, it does make a very strong case. The fight card is:Vitor Belfort/Daijiro MatsuiGuy Mezger/Wanderlei SilvaGiant Ochiai/Ricco RodriguezGary Goodridge/Gilbert YvelIgor Borisov/Mark KerrEnson Inoue/Igor VovchanchynKazunari Murakami/Maasaki SatakeKazuyuki Fujita/Ken ShamrockRyan Gracie/Tokimitsu IshizawaRenzo Gracie/Kazushi SakurabaA quick note: the Murakami/Satake bout is on the Special Features disc. It is worth the extra trouble of putting the disc in, though.In conclusion, especially at this price, buy this DVD.
summary: Not the best ever, but pretty close

reviewText: PRIDE or PRIDE Fighting Championships is the largest mixed martial arts organization in the world. It is based in Japan and currently promoted by Dream Stage Entertainment (DSE). Its inaugural event was held at the Tokyo Dome on October 11, 1997, promoted by Kakutougi Revolution Spirits (KRS). It is the most popular MMA organization in the world based on the number of event attendees: the PRIDE Final Conflict 2003 event had over 67,000 people in the audience. The audience record is 91,107 people on the PRIDE and K-1 co-production Shockwave/Dynamite, held in August 2002. It is considered to be the premiere MMA organization on the planet.PRIDE 10 is one of the greatest events ever released, put on by PRIDE Fighting Championships, the greatest MMA company in the world.This event has it all: brutal knockouts, incredible submissions, and the greatest fighters in the world. Above all, it showcases MMA legend Kazushi Sakuraba in his prime and in all his glory. Sakuraba is regarded not only as the greatest fighter in history, but also the most colorful and entertaining. It is not hard to see why in this event.This is a must-own event for any hardcore fight fan.
summary: One of the All Time Greatest MMA Events
Title: N/A
